named-native-query.name: Vendas.totalPorMes
named-native-query.query: select date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') mes , count(*) total from venda where data_criacao > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and status = 'EMITIDA' group by date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') order by date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') desc

named-native-query.name: Vendas.porOrigem
named-native-query.query: select date_format(v.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') mes , group_concat(distinct (select coalesce(sum(i.quantidade), 0) from item_venda i , cerveja c , venda v1 where i.codigo_venda = v1.codigo and i.codigo_cerveja = c.codigo and c.origem = 'NACIONAL' and date_format(v1.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') = date_format(v.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') )) total_nacional , group_concat(distinct (select coalesce(sum(i.quantidade), 0) from item_venda i , cerveja c , venda v1 where i.codigo_venda = v1.codigo and i.codigo_cerveja = c.codigo and c.origem = 'INTERNACIONAL' and date_format(v1.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') = date_format(v.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') )) total_internacional from venda v where v.data_criacao > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and status = 'EMITIDA' group by date_format(v.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') order by date_format(v.data_criacao, '%Y/%m') desc
